name: seerdb
description: Terminal-based database explorer rewritten in Bun/TypeScript

scripts.build: bun run build:bundle && bun run build:compile
scripts.build:compile: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/index.tsx --compile --outfile dist/seerdb --target bun --minify --external react-devtools-core --external bun:sqlite --loader .wasm=file && cp node_modules/yoga-wasm-web/dist/yoga.wasm dist/ && bun run build:wrapper
scripts.build:wrapper:
echo '#!/usr/bin/env bash
# Wrapper script for SeerDB executable
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
cd "$SCRIPT_DIR" && exec ./seerdb "$@"' > dist/seerdb.sh && chmod +x dist/seerdb.sh
